name: quarantine_an_okta_user_by_sending_a_webhook_to_wo
title: Quarantine an Okta User By Sending a Webhook to Workflows
description: When exposed as a webhook, external systems can invoke this flow to help incident response efforts by adding the user to a quarantine group, clearing the user session, and forcing the user to re-authenticate.This flow could be extended to notify the end user, managers, or administrators through emails or collaboration tools like Slack or Microsoft Teams.
